pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mountain Plots, Folded Empirical Cumulative Distribution Plots // Lattice functions for drawing folded empirical cumulative distribution plots, or mountain plots. A mountain plot is similar to an empirical CDF plot, except that the curve increases from 0 to 0.5, then decreases from 0.5 to 1 using an inverted scale at the right side. See Monti (1995) doi:10.1080/00031305.1995.10476179.
